name: Sombrio V'Al 2 Shorts - Women's
description: Versatile freeride shorts with a pocket to secure your keys or snacks. A gussetted crotch makes for comfortable days in the saddle, while a ride-friendly cut allows for unrestricted spinning or hammering.Lightweight nylon/spandex fabric has 4-way stretch with a DWR coating to shed moisture.Gusseted crotch improves comfort on and off the saddle.2 hand pockets and 1 zippered thigh pocket for secure storage.Flat waistband has internal webbing and buckle.
